data.eml:eml: A new species of treefrog of the genus Ptychohyla (Anura: Hylidae) from Southern Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caviedes-Solís, Itzue W. (2017): A new species of treefrog of the genus Ptychohyla (Anura: Hylidae) from Southern Mexico. Zootaxa 4317 (2): 279-290, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4317.2.5
